text: The 1986 Asian Games, officially known as the X Asian Games, was a sports event in Seoul, South Korea. It occurred from 20 September to 5 October, 1986. There were 296 events from 25 sports and disciplines. ==References== Category:1986 in Asian sport Category:Sport in Seoul Category:1980s in South Korean sport Category:Asian Games by year Category:History of Seoul
title: 1986 Asian Games
